item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

8/22/2011's location will be:

Christy's on Orange

Many people counted this out classic Irish bar when it closed earlier due to financial struggles, but it is BACK and BETTER THAN EVER! Good food, great service and a wonderful atmosphere.  let's come show them that you can survive as a restaurant in New Haven.

 Specials:

50 cents off drinks before 7 (so come early!)

Wings and Nachos

 

Please RSVP for this event to give the proprietor an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please clearly state this in your comment.

 

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Host (Dev) or try to contact them via the information below. We're also often the largest group at the Bar on a Monday - but we may be in their re-done patio...or both!.
item.name: Happy Hour: Christy's is BACK!
